thread.title: Cisco warns of major potential hack in Ukraine

title: Cisco warns of major potential hack in Ukraine
text:
Cisco warns of major potential hack in Ukraine 9:13am EDT - 02:02
CISCO's cyber intelligence unit Talos on Wednesday saying hackers have infected at least half a million routers and storage devices in dozens of countries around the world for a possible cyber attack on Ukraine next month. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
CISCO's cyber intelligence unit Talos on Wednesday saying hackers have infected at least half a million routers and storage devices in dozens of countries around the world for a possible cyber attack on Ukraine next month. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2KPY0X8
